name: Ascent - Demo
description:
Ascent - Demo

Ascent is a grappling, racing game based around the concept of speed, violence and momentum. The player navigates a vertical based racecourse utilising grapple guns to maneuver around obstacles, clear gaps in the track, and to increase speed. Players must race against the clock to achieve a fast time, and are awarded a rank based on their performance.

Navigate through 3 intense levels as fast as possible and achieve glory!

Contact: thegameascent@gmail.com
